column2: 0.9 for need to increase size of cardinality and optionality markers; else 0.9 for using unrecognized symbols without a legend; 0.85 for truncated/obfuscated names; 0.8 for a shape per attribute; else between 0.95 and 0.8 for line jump(s); else 0.6 for separate diagrams; else 0.5 for non-digital diagram generation
column3: 0.95 for a single snake case entity name; 0.9 for capitalized but pluralized entity names; else 0.8 for pluralized and/or underscored and/or lowercase and/or missing entity name(s); else 0.6 for representing entities of a freestyle, somewhat-related database design
column4: 1 (bonus weight) for presence of textual description containing a verb in the diagram; else NULL (not used in calculation of averages)
column5: 0.8 for one or more mis-representations; else 0 for no distinguishment of cardinality differences
column6: 1 (bonus weight) for all proper optionalities; else NULL (not used in calculation of averages)
